name: color-in TD
description:
This is a simple TD game.

To Strengten your only cannon, you can Drag the color box (in right panel) to the white boxes(around the cannon).

Each color box has it's own ability.

Finally, thank you for playing the game.  I'll be glad to receive your comments.

Made By

Godot game engine

Credits

music :  by Zander Noriega
